title: Beloved, Let Us Love, Love is of God
lyrics:
Beloved, let us love,
Love is of God,
In God alone
Hath love its true abode.

Beloved, let us love,
For they who love,
They only,
Are His sons, born from above.

Beloved, let us love,
For love is rest,
And he who loveth not
Dwelleth in night.

Beloved, let us love,
For love is light,
And he who loveth not
Dwelleth in night.

Beloved, let us love,
For only Thus
Shall we behold
That God who loveth us.
